statements: UPDATE researchers SET researcher_name = 'Alice Smith', research_field = 'Genomics' WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE researchers SET researcher_name = 'John Smith', research_field = 'Genomics', drug_targets_found = '{"target1": "protein1", "target2": "protein2"}', genomics_data = '{"data": [1, 2, 3, 4]}' WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
